select ci.id, ci.staff_id, ci.title, ci.content, ci.address, ci.images, ci.start_time, ci.end_time, ci.organizer, ci.status, ci.staff_ids, ci.create_date, si.code as staffCode, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ei.name as enterpriseName, ei.images as enterpriseImages, di.dept_name, poi.name as positionName from conference_info ci left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.staff_id) left join enterprise_info ei on (ei.id = si.enterprise_id) left join dept_info di on (di.id = si.dept_id) left join position_info poi on (poi.id = si.position_id) where 1 = 1
AND ci.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{conferenceInfo.title},'%')
AND ci.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{conferenceInfo.address},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{conferenceInfo.staffName},'%')
AND si.user_id = #{conferenceInfo.staffId}
AND ei.user_id = #{conferenceInfo.enterpriseId}
order by ci.create_date desc
